meanings.definition: Creative skill or ability in a particular field, especially in the arts.
meanings.sent1: Her artistry in painting was evident in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's artistry captivated the audience with each graceful movement.
meanings.sent3: The magician's artistry in card tricks left everyone amazed.
meanings.sent4: His culinary artistry turned simple ingredients into a gourmet feast.
meanings.sent5: The singer's artistry brought the song to life with emotion and passion.

meanings.definition: A work of art or artistic creation.
meanings.sent1: The gallery displayed a variety of artistry from different artists.
meanings.sent2: The sculpture showcased the artist's incredible artistry and talent.
meanings.sent3: The artistry of the handmade jewelry made it a unique gift.
meanings.sent4: The film director's artistry was evident in every frame of the movie.
meanings.sent5: The artistry of the landscape painting transported viewers to another world.
